headline: Buffett's Successor Is Ready To Pass The Ketchup — Berkshire's Kraft Heinz Losses Are Bigger Than You Think
summary: Berkshire Hathaway Inc (NYSE:BRK)(NYSE:BRK) shares underperformed the S&P 500 in 2025, marking a rare miss in the final year under Warren Buffett‘s leadership. With Buffett gone from the CEO role, his successor could have his eye on changing some of the long-standing stock picks.
